plugin.name: Aardwolf_New_Connection
plugin.author: Fiendish
plugin.purpose: Welcome players to the new client package

muclient.script:
done = false function OnPluginListChanged() if not done then done = true dofile "lua/aard_requirements.lua" if GetVariable("showGreeting3") == nil then ShowGreeting() else Connect() end end end
function ShowGreeting() vi_msg = "" if not aard_req_novisuals_mode then vi_msg = "Screen reader users: The non-visual version of this package available at https://fiendish.github.io/aardwolfclientpackage/ comes pre-configured for screen reader output, less display clutter, and sound effects.

" end utils.msgbox("Welcome to the Aardwolf MUSHclient Package!

For client help, type 'aard help' at any time after dismissing this message.

"..vi_msg.."This dialog will not be displayed again.", "Welcome", "ok", "i") SetVariable("showGreeting3", 0) Connect() end
